page.title: 15TOURISM IN NAIRN
page.content: Over one hundred and thirty years ago,a general practitioner in Nairn, Dr Griggor,decided to recommend Nairn to his colleagues south of the border as an ideal area for patients in need of recouperation.The dry mild climate combined with the beautiful beaches and links,and the added attraction of a new direct rail link with Inverness led many people to choose Nairn for their summer vacation.A new hotel,{ {'The Marine'}was opened near the sea and visitors were able to enjoy indoor salt-water baths and the use of bathing machines in the shore.Many people enjoyed the area so much that they built substantial houses in the west end of the town where they spent the summer months.Today there are{20} registered hotels and guest houses and many bed and breakfast facilities in Nairn.
